input.sentences: i visited my brother in his new city .
there was a parade he wanted me to go to .
i saw people that looked like giant bats .
i statue of the city 's founder faces north .
the capitol building looked very cool as i left in the night .
output.sentences: I went to the city to visit my brother.
While I was there we saw a parade that had a lot of colorful costumes.
Some of the people had costumes that looked giant.
We saw a bronze statue of the city's founder that faced to the North.
When night began we looked to the left and saw the capital lit up in colors.
